block.p: LEAD: Closings in the week ended Aug. 22 MANHATTAN Chelsea $364,000 471 West 22d Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a recently renovated prewar building; dining area, 2 terraces, fireplace; maintenance $770, 50% tax-deductible (Broker: Joffee LaSalle)

LEAD: Closings in the week ended Aug. 22 MANHATTAN Chelsea $364,000 471 West 22d Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a recently renovated prewar building; dining area, 2 terraces, fireplace; maintenance $770, 50% tax-deductible (Broker: Joffee LaSalle)

Closings in the week ended Aug. 22 MANHATTAN Chelsea $364,000 471 West 22d Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a recently renovated prewar building; dining area, 2 terraces, fireplace; maintenance $770, 50% tax-deductible (Broker: Joffee LaSalle) Stuyvesant Sq. Area $140,000 145 East 15th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 685-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; 24-hr. doorman, dining foyer, new windows; maintenance $440, 50% tax deductible (Broker:

Buchbinder & Warren) Upper East Side $840,000 525 East 86th Street 5-bedroom, 4-bath, 1,910-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; 24-hr. doorman, dining room, East River view; maintenance $1,891, 50% tax-deductible (Broker: Lyons & Associates) Upper East Side $685,000 1020 Park Avenue (85th St.) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,520-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; 24-hr. doorman, manned elevator, formal dining room; maintenance $1,278, 41% tax-deductible (Broker: B.J. Gottesman) Upper East Side $954,000 1165 Fifth Avenue (97th St.) 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 1,780-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doorman, concierge, manned elevator, dining room, fireplace; maintenance $1,250, 30% tax-deductible (Broker:

Corcoran Group) Upper West Side $495,000 91 Central Park West (69th St.) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a renovated prewar building; 24-hr. doorman, dining foyer, partial Central Park view; maintenance $658, 33% tax-deductible (Broker:

Charles H. Greenthal Residential Sales) BRONX Baychester $130,000 4015 DeRimer Avenue 2-family, attached, brick house; 3 bedrooms in primary unit; 2 bedrooms in other, 1 bath, dining area, large kitchens in both; finished basement, 1-car garage, 25- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,200 (Broker:

Marland Real Estate) Parkchester $185,000 1201 Pugsley Avenue 2-family, detached, brick house; 4 bedrooms, 2 baths in primary unit; 3 bedrooms, 1 bath in other; dining room, large kitchens in each; finished basement, 1-car garage, 25- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,200 (Broker:

Gold Circle North Realty) BROOKLYN Kensington $81,450 350 Ocean Parkway 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 875-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; dining area, new windows, remodeled kitchen and bath; maintenance $410, 38% tax-deductible (Broker: Elise Franco Brown) Park Slope $176,000 85 6th Avenue 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,200-sq,-ft. condo in a recently renovated prewar building; large living room, hardwood floors, common charge $140, 100% tax-abated (Broker:

John P. Barry Realty) QUEENS Briarwood $82,000 141-60 84th Road (Claridge) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; entry foyer, large kitchen, optional garage space; maintenance $348, 52% tax-deductible (Broker: Kraham Realty) Forest Hills $399,500 100-38 75th Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, single-family, detached, stucco frame house; dining room, powder room, fireplace, front and rear gardens, 50- by 90-ft. lot; taxes $1,450 (Broker: Terrace Realty) STATEN ISLAND Manor Heights $190,000 187 Melba Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, single-family, semi-attached, frame house; formal dining room, finished basement, 30-by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,400 (Broker:

Salmon Real Estate) St. George $159,000 146 Westervelt Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, single-family, detached Victorian; formal dining room, sun deck, front and rear gardens, 25- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $419 (Broker: J.P. Walsh)
